metadata.name: Stability Is Key
metadata.description:
Divina Casas at her home pool outside of Los Angeles in 2020 following the first release from statewide lockdowns due to the Covid-19 pandemic.  This image was one of the first I was able to do as things began to open up after the first wave of Covid abated in California.

The primary purchaser of this piece is entitled to a chromogenic printed work up to 20 inches.  My preference is to us Kodak Metallic* paper as I feel it provides the most dimensionality of all papers.  

*This may depend on its availability in the market due to supply constraints.

attributes.value: Nikon Z7 with Nikkor 14-30mm in a Nauticam Z7 Housing With 230mm Dome Port
